message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper is related to Natural Language Processing (NLP) which falls under the category of cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper discusses the implementation of word clustering in Bangla language using machine learning techniques, which is related to Information Retrieval (IR) and Artificial Intelligence (AI). The use of language models such as tri-gram, 4-gram, and 5-gram also suggests that the paper could be categorized under cs.LG (Learning) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
